item.description:
It would be great if Merrick Garland got the same media team that did the Jan 6 hearings to work on making the case of Trump's criminality to the public. That's really where the trial will take place, where the future of the country will be decided.

That said, yesterday's Garland talk, while brief, was effective.

Speak softly and carry a big stick.

https://t.co/FxjAvOOZNO

He carries the biggest stick, almost as big as that held by the Supreme Court, or POTUS or the Federal Reserve Bank, the Koch Brothers.
item.source:markdown:
It would be great if Merrick Garland got the same media team that did the Jan 6 hearings to work on making the case of Trump's criminality to the public. That's really where the trial will take place, where the future of the country will be decided.
That said, yesterday's Garland talk, while brief, was effective.
Speak softly and carry a big stick.
https://t.co/FxjAvOOZNO
He carries the biggest stick, almost as big as that held by the Supreme Court, or POTUS or the Federal Reserve Bank, the Koch Brothers.

item.description: @jeffjarvis i hate to see you struggle with the nyt. they are a lost cause. it's like that character in harry met sally. she keeps learning that her lover will never leave his wife. the nyt is incorrigible. i know you're a journalism prof, so you kind of have to accept them.
item.source:markdown: @jeffjarvis i hate to see you struggle with the nyt. they are a lost cause. it's like that character in harry met sally. she keeps learning that her lover will never leave his wife. the nyt is incorrigible. i know you're a journalism prof, so you kind of have to accept them.

item.description:
NBA fans -- one star enters NYC with love, the other came in as a snob and is trying to exit with ultimatums.

KD for all his prowess on the court doesn't have a connection with any fans anywhere. That's why no one wants him. https://t.co/4hwVVeSp56
item.source:markdown:
NBA fans -- one star enters NYC with love, the other came in as a snob and is trying to exit with ultimatums.
KD for all his prowess on the court doesn't have a connection with any fans anywhere. That's why no one wants him. https://t.co/4hwVVeSp56

item.description:
Jalen Brunson, newly signed Knicks star, shows KD and Kyrie how to come to a new city like NY, one with a lot of ego and history tied up in NBA basketball. A city like NY is a lover, but first you have to seduce.

https://t.co/tAmxlbb8by
item.source:markdown:
Jalen Brunson, newly signed Knicks star, shows KD and Kyrie how to come to a new city like NY, one with a lot of ego and history tied up in NBA basketball. A city like NY is a lover, but first you have to seduce.
https://t.co/tAmxlbb8by

item.description:
1/4 One of the reasons I prefer to write on the open web rather than on Facebook is that if I get an Aha! idea about a feature, on my blog I can implement it. On Facebook I'm just a user.

2/4 That was/is one of the great things about the web. Anyone can develop features for it. On Facebook, just their employees can. No wonder it never moves.

3/4 When a company dominates an activity, they tend to invest elsewhere. Seems kind of perverse, but that's why markets don't always evolve to fill every niche.

4/4 If you want to perform a new style of music in Central Park, you can. If you want to do it in Carnegie Hall or Lincoln Center, you need to get the approval of a lot of rich people
item.source:markdown:
1/4 One of the reasons I prefer to write on the open web rather than on Facebook is that if I get an Aha! idea about a feature, on my blog I can implement it. On Facebook I'm just a user.
2/4 That was/is one of the great things about the web. Anyone can develop features for it. On Facebook, just their employees can. No wonder it never moves.
3/4 When a company dominates an activity, they tend to invest elsewhere. Seems kind of perverse, but that's why markets don't always evolve to fill every niche.
4/4 If you want to perform a new style of music in Central Park, you can. If you want to do it in Carnegie Hall or Lincoln Center, you need to get the approval of a lot of rich people
